title: A  Double-Blind, Active-Controlled Multi-Center Study of PAN-967 (PARP inhibitor) in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
officialTitle: A  Double-Blind, Active-Controlled Multi-Center Study of PAN-967 (PARP inhibitor) in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
description: This is a  double-blind, active-controlled multi-center study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of PAN-967 (PARP inhibitor) in patients with Major Depressive Disorder. The study will enroll approximately 93 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 21-72 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Major Depressive Disorder
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
